spec_data.Name: shorewall
spec_data.Description:
The Shoreline Firewall, more commonly known as "Shorewall", is a
Netfilter (iptables) based firewall that can be used on a dedicated
firewall system, a multi-function gateway/ router/server or on a
standalone GNU/Linux system.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 27 Jul 2017 06:02:08 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: An iptables front end for firewall configuration
